data.scheme_name: Gujarat Semiconductor Policy 2022 - 2027 - Incentives on Power Tariff and Electricity Duty - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides power tariff subsidy of Rs. 2 per unit for a period of 10 years starting from COD.
data.eligibility:
Any Company / consortia / joint venture which has applied under the following schemes to set up operations in Gujarat: 
Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Display Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Compound Semiconductors / Silicon Photonics / Sensors Fab and Semiconductor Assembly, Testing, Marking and Packaging (ATMP) / OSAT facilities
data.conditions: Power tariff incentive will not be applicable for energy consumed from captive power plant & energy consumed for desalination plant.
data.beneficiaries:
Any Company / consortia / joint venture which has applied under the following schemes to set up operations in Gujarat: 
Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Display Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Compound Semiconductors / Silicon Photonics / Sensors Fab and Semiconductor Assembly, Testing, Marking and Packaging (ATMP) / OSAT facilities
data.prerequisites: Power tariff incentive will not be applicable for energy consumed from captive power plant & energy consumed for desalination plant.
data.context:
The Government of Gujarat is committed towards the vision of Government of India in making India as the next global hub of semiconductor and display manufacturing sector.
The Gujarat Semiconductor Policy (2022-27) will facilitate the eligible projects for land allotment, enable expedited process approvals, ready access to utilities such as power, water, gas and other industrial infrastructure besides the fiscal incentive support package under this policy.
data.objective: Objective of the scheme is to make Gujarat a pioneer State in developing the Indian ESDM ecosystem by facilitating effective and timely execution of the eligible projects for setting up of a robust semiconductor and Display Fab Ecosystem, and thereby creating more employment giving boost to socio-economic development of the State.
data.description: Eligible projects will be entitled to : Power tariff subsidy : Rs. 2 per unit for a period of 10 years starting from the date of start of commercial operations. Electricity duty exemption : As per the provisions laid down under Gujarat Electricity Duty Act, 1958.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicant can apply on the below mentioned portal -
https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/login
data.funding_facilitator: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The disbursement of the power tariff subsidy shall be done in yearly installments.
data.additional_info:
1. In case of projects with a significant component of FDI (Foreign Direct Investment) or projects relocating from abroad, the State Government reserves the right to provide power tariff subsidy at an enhanced rate for a limited period of time to ensure power availability at globally competitive rates. 
  2. Eligible Capital Expenditure : Capital expenditure / investment incurred on building, plant, machinery, clean rooms, equipment, and associated utilities (including used / second hand / refurbished) as well as tools, dies, moulds, jigs, fixtures (including parts, accessories, components, and spares thereof) of the same, used in the manufacturing process eligible under the Scheme. 
  3. It shall also include expenditure on packaging, freight / transport, insurance, and erection and commissioning of the plant, machinery, equipment, and associated utilities. 
  4. Associated utilities would include captive power and effluent treatment plants, essential equipment required in operations areas such as clean rooms, air curtains, temperature and air quality control systems, compressed air, water and power supply, and control systems etc. 
  5. Associated utilities would also include IT and ITES infrastructure related to manufacturing including servers, software, and ERP solutions.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission , Department of Science & Technology, Government of Gujarat , Block No. 11, 9th Floor, Udyog Bhavan, Gandhinagar-382010
Ph. No. : 079-232-52197
Email ID : mnbtm7@gujarat.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries -  Private Limited Company, Public Company, Others - Gujarat - All MSMEs, All Non - MSMEs
